HalfWaveLength(double, double?)

Calculates the physical length of a half-wave antenna

public static double HalfWaveLength(double frequency, double? velocityFactor = null)

Parameters

frequency double

Frequency in Hz

velocityFactor double?

Velocity factor (default varies by frequency: 1.0 for >1GHz, 0.95 for lower frequencies)

Returns

double

Physical length in meters

Frequency in Hz

velocityFactor double?

double
